Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Improvement of humoral immunity occurred in 60 % of responders ( p < 0 . 001 ) and in the majority of patients who achieved stable disease .

Let's think step by step.

1. Humoral immunity: Humoral immunity is not a chemical entity per se, but rather a part of the immune system. It refers to the production of antibodies by B cells in response to an antigen, which helps protect the body against infections.

Therefore, no chemical entities are explicitly mentioned in the paragraph. However, humoral immunity is an important biological process that involves the production of antibodies, which are proteins. So, if we consider antibodies as biological entities, then the paragraph mentions the involvement of antibodies in the improvement of humoral immunity.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Chemical.
There are no explicit chemical entities mentioned in the paragraph. The paragraph only refers to biological entities such as humoral immunity and antibodies.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Antibodies (proteins) |

Note: The paragraph mentions "humoral immunity," but it is not a chemical entity. It is a part of the immune system that involves the production of antibodies. Antibodies are proteins, so they are the only chemical entity mentioned in the paragraph, albeit indirectly.
